Description: It may be a pharaoh is not a dream so hard to get.
Be the mad god craziest of all using this amazing skin!
Join the horde of the lich, learn from the phylactery bearer the various spells!
Why not myself commanded the haunted cemetery?
The most sugary, the most sweety, hmm... It's really a delight to use this skin.
Join the dark army of The Forgotten King!
K is Bae! Thanks to: Devwarlt.
Rare skin around the LoE Realm! Thanks to: Devwarlt.
It's time to play and to laugh! Have fun with your friends using this incredible and cheerful skin. Thanks to: NPEtoPPEx.
Only the strongest of all ninja is worthy of this skin! Thanks to: NPEtoPPEx and Devwarlt.

Description: Made only for the best and only the best.
A staff shaped by the darkest forces of Oryx kingdom.
This skull contains the purest of life and the darkest of evil, when used, this is unleashed in a massive blast.
The most coveted and valuable robe found in all the kingdom of Oryx, only the bravest may have the merit of using it.
There are no words to define the power and hauntings that are around this ring. Even the great kings fell into the temptation to get it, but without success.

$.name: Additional Info
$.description: This item is a rare version of Ring of the Sphinx.

Description: The malachite stone makes you feel at peace with the land.

$.name: Additional Info

Description: The azure stone makes you feel ready for any situation.

$.name: Additional Info

Description: The dolomite stone makes you feel able to stand against anything.
The great sword used by the Dark Knight to obliterate all in his way.

id: Evil Shield of the Dark Knight
Description: A shield that sometimes moves by itself, as if it was living.
Powerful, and quite uplifting ironically. This armor was meant for true knights.
Once worn it can't be contained. Instead the user will be consumed and be controlled by the dark evil that is held within.
A branch taken from the Tree of Life, enchanted with an emerald source-stone to enhance its powers.
The souls of woodland creatures are channeled through this scepter. It occasionally flaps its wings wildly.
Woven from living plants, these robes hold the knowledge of life itself.
Warm to the touch, this trinket fills its wearer with the bulwark of nature.
A large sword made out of the strongest and lightest metals from the Lands of the Phoenix God.
This helmet was used in the Battle of the Titans, centuries before Oryx's Reign.
This armor was forged in the Eternal Crucible for the allied giant nations nearby.
Although lacking the ability to make one immortal, this amulet will make you be able to stand up to most foes.
A smooth bow created from the legs of a terrifyingly large spider. It still twitches, as though it is not quite dead yet.
A trap woven by a beautiful spider. Its intricate patterns create a beautiful, yet deadly trap.

$.description: 200 HP Within 9 sqrs

Description: A hide armor that got infested with spiders. Egg sacs are still present, but the spiderlings never harm the wearer.
A large fang taken from an enormous spider. This token fills its wearer with a dark, mysterious power.
A velvet cloak that sends the user into a different dimension itself.
A one-of-a-kind quiver forged by Bloodorcs to pierce through the mightiest demons.
Harnesses the power of time and space itself into an extremely harmful burst.
Legends say that the fountains of the Nexus were all made out of this one book.
A tough, reinforced helm only gifted to warriors who fight in self-defense.
A tough, steel shield coated with rough, hot magma rock that burns all enemies who dare approach it.
A devilish orb that traps your foes in the 1940s for 9 seconds!
Instead of using it to toughen up your immune system, you decide to give your foes a taste of it. It's even worse than rotten milk.
This seal is said to contain an amount of power too extreme for one to handle.
A prism once used to take control of his enemies souls, causing them to forever wander in search of the illusion they saw.
A bloodwef- I mean, blue scepter adorned with sapphires, used by an ancient sect of masterful wiz- I mean, sorcerers.
Nectar of gods is not enough to make your pet stronger. Be the mad god! Special food for all LoE players!
An enormous, flawless spinel set in a stunningly beautiful gold ring.
An enormous, flawless topaz set in a stunningly beautiful gold ring.
An enormous, flawless emerald set in a stunningly beautiful gold ring.
An enormous, flawless ruby set in a stunningly beautiful gold ring.
An enormous, flawless sapphire set in a stunningly beautiful gold ring.
An enormous, flawless onyx set in a stunningly beautiful gold ring.
An enormous, flawless citrine set in a stunningly beautiful gold ring.
An enormous, flawless amethyst set in a stunningly beautiful gold ring.
A key which opens a portal to the Ivory Wyvern.
A map that reveals the way to hidden treasure.

Description: ...finally, I cornered and killed the beast. When I awoke in a cold sweat... I felt youthful, powerful. Thanks to: Norga.
As I lifted the stone from its resting place it became readily apparent there was more to it than met the eye...
Magical blasts can be blocked by armor, but true fear will pierce their hides and strike their heart. Thanks to: Testing.
An astronomically heavy katana. It is forged from dark matter.
Seemingly bleak at first, this prism has erratic magical properties looming inside, which affect the light it scatters in unforeseen ways.
A relic kept in the deepest dreams of puppets.
No human in Oryx kingdom was able to handle the power that is written in this spell yet.
To handle the dark powers that surround this equipment you must have a lot of wisdom.
